price: Allah, tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) melainkan Dia.  Yang hidup kekal lagi terus menerus mengurus makhluk-Nya181.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ
footnotes: 181.  Maksudnya, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  mengatur langit dan bumi serta isinya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
